---
description: A pluggable Header component.
---

A pluggable and themeable header component for use in apps, websites and platforms.

import { Header } from './header';
import { Logo } from '@bitdesign/sparks.content.logo';

## Component usage

Use the component:

```js
<Header
  logo={<Logo name="Sparks" slogan="Design System" />}
  actions={[
    () => <div>Login</div>,
    () => <div>Sign up</div>
  ]}
/>
```

### Header actions

You can inject new Actions to the Header using the `actions` property. It renders components in the set order in the top right end of the header component:

```js live
<Header
  logo={<Logo name="Sparks" slogan="Design System" />}
  actions={[() => <div>Login</div>, () => <div>Sign up</div>]}
/>
```

### Logo

Use the logo component or set 

```js live
<Header
  logo={<Logo name="Sparks" slogan="Design System" />}
  actions={[() => <div>Login</div>, () => <div>Sign up</div>]}
/>
```


## Main contents

You can set the header main contents using by rendering childs to the component:

```tsx
<Header
  logo={<Logo name="Sparks" slogan="Design System" />}
>
  <Flex>
    <Link>Product</Link>
    <Link>Solutions</Link>
  </Flex>
</Header>
```
